title: MiF
author: MiF
content: I see that btc almost hit 25k$ this morning and i believe that if btc rise 25k$ most of the altcoins will also rise or follow btc trend, so i think this time will be the very best time to decide what altcoins can give us profit in short term investment if you have any suggestions please extend or let me know.

I would advice anyone to stay away from alts for now until the dust settles. The price seems to unstable at the moment, going to $25k, coming back to $23k, and then back to $25k and then again to $24k and a bit stable. comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: It's no secret that altcoins always follow bitcoin. Bitcoin goes up, altcoins go up, bitcoin goes down, altcoins go down even more. The correlation is obvious. The best solution for short-term speculation in altcoins was to buy them at the beginning of the year, when everything was at the bottom and many coins were selling at a big discount. To successfully speculate on altcoins in the short term now, you need to get the trend right. If you do it wrong, a bitcoin correction can lead to a big collapse of the already high altcoin prices.
